title: GDG DevFest Switzerland 2018
description: The biggest Google tech conference in Switzerland carefully crafted for you by the GDG community! It's all about Android, web, cloud and machine learning from the world experts
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev, tensorflow
motto: The biggest conference on Google technologies in Switzerland organized by GDG Switzerland. All about machine learning, programming, emerging technologies and much more!
notEnoughMoney: Cannot afford a ticket, but would like to attend? Please drop us a short email to info@devfest.ch, so we can get in contact with you.
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.
socialMotto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: The iconic HSR Hochschule für Technik Rapperswil is located next to the lake of Zurich, and the large conference room is perfect for hosting the GDG DevFest 2018
locationAddress: HSR Hochschule für Technik Rapperswil, Oberseestrasse 10, 8640 Rapperswil
aboutOrganizers: GDG Zürich with support of multiple GDGs from all around Switzerland is proud organizer of DevFest Switzerland
aboutGdg: Google Developer Group (GDG) - is an open and volunteer geek community that creates exciting projects and shares experiences about Google technologies with a passion
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking locations on Google Maps and communicating over Gmail. For everyday users, these services are taken for granted. But developers have to think about these services in a different way. They need to deal with API integrations, scalability issues and complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is all about.

[Google Developer Group (GDG) Zürich](https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Zurich/) - is an open and volunteer geek community that creates exciting projects and shares experiences about Google technologies with a passion.

Our vision is to provide a platform for industry experts and developers to connect and to boost the technological development in Switzerland.
